extract_attitude.purpose: Extracts Euler angles (roll, pitch, yaw) from ATTITUDE messages.
extract_attitude.returns: Dictionary mapping time_boot_ms to [roll, pitch, yaw].

extract_flight_modes.purpose: Extracts flight mode changes using HEARTBEAT messages.
extract_flight_modes.returns: List of [time_boot_ms, flight_mode_string] when mode changes.

extract_events.purpose: Extracts arming/disarming events from HEARTBEAT message's base_mode field.
extract_events.returns: List of [time_boot_ms, 'Armed' or 'Disarmed'] based on mode changes.

extract_mission.purpose: Extracts mission waypoints (lat, lon, alt) from CMD messages.

extract_vehicle_type.purpose: Identifies the vehicle type from HEARTBEAT.craft messages.

extract_trajectory_sources.purpose: Detects available sources for trajectory data.
extract_trajectory_sources.returns: List of available source keys such as GLOBAL_POSITION_INT, GPS_RAW_INT, AHRS2, AHRS3.

extract_trajectory.purpose: Extracts trajectory data (lon, lat, alt, time) from one of the supported sources.
extract_trajectory.returns: Dictionary with source as key and values including startAltitude, trajectory (list), and timeTrajectory (dict).

extract_text_messages.purpose: Extracts status messages from STATUSTEXT messages.

extract_named_value_float_names.purpose: Returns unique parameter names from NAMED_VALUE_FLOAT in messages.
